object.name: finance-account
object.property: <model xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="account_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Number</title> </field> <field name="closed" type="zope.schema.Bool" form:widget="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"> <default>False</default> <description>Select if this account has closed</description> <title>Closed</title> </field> <field name="account_type" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Account Type</title> <values> <element>cash</element> <element>bank</element> <element>credit card</element> <element>asset</element> <element>liability</element> </values> </field> <field name="exclude_from_summary" type="zope.schema.Bool" form:widget="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"> <default>False</default> <description/> <title>Exclude from summary</title> </field> <field name="exclude_from_budget" type="zope.schema.Bool" form:widget="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"> <default>False</default> <description/> <title>Exclude from budget</title> </field> <field name="exclude_from_reports" type="zope.schema.Bool" form:widget="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"> <default>False</default> <description/> <title>Exclude from reports</title> </field> <field name="starting_balance" type="zope.schema.Float"> <default>0.0</default> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Starting balance</title> </field> </schema> </model>
